statements: SELECT * FROM energy_distribution_data;
SELECT id, energy_consumed, energy_source FROM energy_distribution_data;
SELECT timestamp, energy_consumed FROM energy_distribution_data WHERE location_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM energy_distribution_data WHERE energy_source = 'Solar';
SELECT id, timestamp FROM energy_distribution_data ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT id, timestamp, energy_consumed FROM energy_distribution_data WHERE location_id = 1 ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 5
SELECT id, energy_source, timestamp FROM energy_distribution_data WHERE energy_consumed > 1000 ORDER BY energy_consumed ASC LIMIT 10
SELECT MAX(energy_consumed) AS max_energy_consumed, location_id FROM energy_distribution_data GROUP BY location_id ORDER BY max_energy_consumed DESC
SELECT * FROM energy_distribution_data WHERE timestamp BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-02-01' AND energy_source = 'Solar' ORDER BY timestamp ASC LIMIT 5
SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT location_id) AS unique_locations, AVG(energy_consumed) AS avg_energy_consumed FROM energy_distribution_data GROUP BY energy_source ORDER BY unique_locations DESC
SELECT * FROM historical_energy_data ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT energy_consumption, temperature FROM historical_energy_data WHERE location = 'New York' AND temperature > 80;
SELECT location, timestamp, energy_consumption FROM historical_energy_data WHERE energy_consumption < 50 ORDER BY energy_consumption ASC;
SELECT AVG(energy_consumption) AS avg_consumption, MAX(energy_consumption) AS max_consumption FROM historical_energy_data;
SELECT optimization_id, timestamp, energy_saved FROM energy_optimization WHERE energy_saved > 1000 ORDER BY energy_saved DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT timestamp, energy_consumption, temperature, location FROM historical_energy_data WHERE timestamp >= '2022-01-01' AND energy_consumption > 100 ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT energy_consumption, temperature, location FROM historical_energy_data WHERE location = 'New York' ORDER BY energy_consumption DESC, temperature ASC;
SELECT timestamp, energy_saved, optimization_details FROM energy_optimization WHERE energy_saved > 50 ORDER BY timestamp ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT optimization_id, timestamp, energy_saved FROM energy_optimization WHERE timestamp BETWEEN '2022-02-01' AND '2022-03-01' ORDER BY energy_saved DESC, timestamp ASC;

SELECT * FROM historical_energy_data JOIN energy_optimization ON historical_energy_data.timestamp = energy_optimization.timestamp WHERE energy_consumption > 200 AND energy_saved > 50 ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM energy_distribution;
SELECT id, timestamp, energy_consumed FROM energy_sources WHERE capacity > 1000;
SELECT location, energy_consumption FROM energy_consumers ORDER BY location DESC;
SELECT id, source_type, location FROM energy_sources WHERE capacity < 500 ORDER BY source_type ASC;
SELECT id, energy_consumed, energy_consumed * 0.1 AS maintenance FROM energy_distribution;
SELECT id, timestamp, energy_consumed, location FROM energy_distribution ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT id, consumer_type, energy_consumption, location FROM energy_consumers WHERE energy_consumption > 100 ORDER BY location ASC;
SELECT id, source_type, capacity, location FROM energy_sources WHERE capacity BETWEEN 50 AND 100 ORDER BY capacity DESC;
SELECT id, source_type, capacity, location FROM energy_sources WHERE capacity > 200 AND location = 'New York';

SELECT ed.timestamp, ec.consumer_type, es.source_type, ed.energy_consumed, ec.energy_consumption, es.capacity FROM energy_distribution ed JOIN energy_consumers ec ON ed.location = ec.location JOIN energy_sources es ON ed.location = es.location WHERE ed.timestamp > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY ed.timestamp DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM historical_energy_data;
SELECT timestamp, energy_consumed, location FROM energy_consumption_patterns ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT energy_consumed, peak_demand FROM energy_consumption_patterns WHERE location = 'NYC';
SELECT * FROM energy_sources WHERE capacity > 1000 AND efficiency > 0.8;
SELECT source_id, source_type, capacity, efficiency FROM energy_sources ORDER BY capacity DESC, efficiency ASC;
SELECT * FROM historical_energy_data ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT location, energy_consumed FROM historical_energy_data WHERE location = 'New York' AND energy_consumed > 500 ORDER BY timestamp ASC;

SELECT energy_sources.source_type, energy_distribution.location, energy_distribution.energy_consumed FROM energy_sources INNER JOIN energy_distribution ON energy_sources.source_id = energy_distribution.source_id WHERE energy_sources.capacity > 1000 AND energy_sources.efficiency > 0.8;
SELECT energy_consumed, peak_demand, location FROM energy_consumption_patterns WHERE timestamp BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-01-31' ORDER BY peak_demand DESC, energy_consumed ASC LIMIT 10;
SELECT DISTINCT location FROM energy_sources WHERE source_type = 'Solar' ORDER BY location ASC LIMIT 3;
SELECT * FROM historical_energy_data ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 10
SELECT energy_consumption, energy_production FROM historical_energy_data WHERE energy_consumption > energy_production
SELECT distribution_id, city_id, energy_delivered FROM energy_distribution WHERE timestamp >= '2022-01-01'
SELECT * FROM waste_reduction WHERE waste_type = 'Plastic' ORDER BY waste_amount DESC LIMIT 5
SELECT cost_type, cost_amount FROM energy_costs ORDER BY cost_amount
SELECT * FROM historical_energy_data WHERE energy_consumption > 100 AND energy_production < 50
SELECT timestamp, energy_consumption FROM historical_energy_data WHERE timestamp >= '2022-01-01 00:00:00'
SELECT DISTINCT distribution_zone FROM energy_distribution WHERE city_id = '123456'
SELECT timestamp, waste_type, waste_amount FROM waste_reduction WHERE waste_type = 'Plastic' AND waste_amount > 10
SELECT cost_type, cost_amount FROM energy_costs WHERE timestamp BETWEEN '2022-01-01 00:00:00' AND '2022-01-31 23:59:59'
